blocks.content:
I designed and developed a Shopify site for Nature Cos, a professional and organic make-up brand, using Liquid, Sass and HTML. The site showcases their products, tells the brand's story and features themed articles.
See the website

I worked to enhance the different Nature Cos brands (Miss W Pro, Green Care, Couleur Caramel) by creating a fluid user experience and a design that reflected their respective values. This approach made it possible to highlight the unique identity of each brand while building visual and functional harmony, to offer a coherent whole that respects their artistic uniqueness.

image.caption: The blog is an integral part of the site. It was integrated directly into Shopify in liquid form. A categorisation system makes it easy to filter articles.
Designed to offer a fluid and intuitive browsing experience, these sub-categories guide customers easily to the products that correspond to them.
I set up a store locator combining Google Maps and Shopify, enabling users to easily locate nearby points of sale thanks to a fluid and interactive integration.
